name: BIG DEATH ROCK
description:
You play as a Meteor heading to earth. Try to be as big as you can when you hit Earth to try and kill as much of Earth's life as you can. And maybe you too can be as famous as all those other era ending meteors.

On your way, watch out for other space debris and anything Earth's inhabitants try to throw at you.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We'd love to hear feedback. And we hope you enjoy this rough little game.
